Nantwich’s hardest working bike shop!

A hub for our community. Our workshop is the heart of our business, call or visit us to discuss servicing and repairs.

Contact Us

See what our customers say:

Richard Booth

" Fantastic, relaxed environment! Great place to browse at bikes, bring your own in or stop off on your ride for a sit down, coffee and a chat! With someone who knows exactly what they are doing! Fully recommended! "

Liz Tidwell

" Can't recommend One More Bicycle highly enough, absolutely quality service from Mark. My first bike since being a kid, guided me through what would be best for me, set me up correctly regards fit, absolutely top notch pre-delivery service = one very satisfied customer!! "

Philip Tonks

" I was doing LEJOG solo and unsupported and needed to keep on top of bike maintenance. Mark offered to degrease my chain there and then despite being busy. I was up against it time-wise and he helped no end. Friendly and professional service. "

Dan Townend

" Fantastic service and doesn’t charge the world like the ‘bigger bike shops’, Mark was so helpful, he fitted a chain and cassette on my mountain bike but the 1x11 I’d just fitted wasn’t playing ball, he made it work in the end and wouldn’t take no for an answer as I’m going to Llandegla tomorrow and he said “I couldn’t let you leave and not go riding tomorrow”, other places wouldn’t have that attitude. "

Paul Connell
